description:
Reunited with Sanosuke, Kenshin lays plans to stop Shishio from burning Tokyo to create the confusion he needs to overthrow the government. But Shishio harbors a surprise with his newest weapon, an ironclad battleship hidden inside another
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tobu ga Gotoku! Senkan Rengoku Shukkou o Soshi seyo
หยุดเรือรบเรนโกกคุให้ได้
翔ぶが如く! 戦艦煉獄 出航を阻止せよ
